history.narrative: Law 20-62, the “Driver’s Safety Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-275. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2013, and November 5, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 18, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-211 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-62 became effective on January 17, 2014.
